snippet: Artifacts from gangsters, murderers and high-profile outlaws are popular items at auctions and fill museums, feeding a fascination with felonious figures.
abstract: Eve M Kahn Antiques column notes the popularity of artifacts linked to famous crimes, as evidenced in several auctions and exhibitions around the country.
lead_paragraph: Artifacts from gangsters, murderers and high-profile outlaws are popular items at auctions and fill museums, feeding a fascination with felonious figures.

headline.seo: Gangsters, Outlaws and Artifacts of Their Crime Sprees
headline.main: Bloodstains With a Story: The Allure of Artifacts Linked to Famous Crimes
